channel.title: Help pl0x :S
channel.description:
okay i need help on 2 things :S
1. im trying to add godwars. so i would like the panel. i have added it and it works fine when ur in the area. but when i try to tele there the panel dosent show up. but if i relog when im in the area. it shows up.
do i have to put anything like update rquired or huh ? :S
2.i wonder how i can add prayer. cause i can click every prayer button and nothing happens. like how can they show up above head ? pl0x give me a hint or sumthin.
